message: Hi Bob, I have the product you're interested in. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I think $90 would be a fair price for it.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. It's a fair price considering the value the product brings.
Hello Alice, I understand your position. How about we settle at $100 for the product?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob. I can do $115, but I think I can do a bit better than that. How about we meet in the middle at $112.50?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to meet my price. Considering the value of the product, I think $105 would be a fair price.
I think we're getting close, Bob. I can do $108, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. It's a fair price considering the value the product brings.
